description.english: Play a rookie match wih AI bots
Win a match after losing 5 matches
Defeat an enemy 3 levels or higher
Win a solo Deathmatch against a player who is in a 10+ win streak
Deal 50+ % of the damage to a victim before he dies
Get the first kill in a match
Kill the last enemy in a team Deathmatch battle
Kill 3 enemies without dying in a round
Kill a player who is in a kill streak
Kill 5 enemies without dying in a round
Kill 10 enemies without dying in a round
Deliver the killing shot on all enemies in a team match without taking any damage
Level up for the first time
Level up 5 unique outlaws to Outlaw
Level up 5 unique outlaws to Deathbringer
Have a 10 game winning streak in rank matches
Kill 1 opponent during secondary evade in a match (Phantom Poncho)
Disarm each of the enemies using Rattle Bite in a team deathmatch (Phantom Poncho)
Kill 3 opponent with Lead Hammer in a match (Phantom Poncho)
Get 75% accuracy in a match (Phantom Poncho)
Deal 80% of total team damage (Phantom Poncho)
Killing 2 enemies within 10 seconds of your first kill in a team match (Phantom Poncho)
Kill an opponent with Knife Throw in a match (Killer)
Kill an enemy with a Knife Slash (Killer)
Kill an enemy with Fan The Hammer (Killer)
Receive less than 10% of damage dealt in a match (Killer)
Kill an opponent with dynamite (Kid Red)
Kill an enemy with Devil In Your Pocket (Kid Red)
Stun 10 enemies in a match (Kid Red)
Get 70% accuracy in a match (Kid Red)
Deal 80% of total team damage (Kid Red)
Kill 2 or more enemies with one explosion (Kid Red)
Kill an enemy with Snipe Shot in a match (Deserter)
Kill an enemy while in adrendline state (Deserter)
Kill an enemy with the impale combo (Deserter)
Receive 70% of total team damage in a match with at least as many kills as deaths (Deserter)
Heal over 1,000 HP with all your allies alive at the end of the match (Deserter)
Kill an enemy with the Sword Slash (Matador)
Blind 10 enemies in a match with Dust Storm (Matador)
Kill 3 or more enemies with an execution in a team match (Matador)
Perform 5 roll-shot critical hits in a match (The Wolf)
Perform 5 special stuns or wounds in a match (The Wolf)
Kill an enemy with a wolf pounce (The Wolf)
Get 90% accuracy in a match (The Wolf)
Deal 80% of total team damage (The Wolf)
Kill every enemy with a critical shot in a team match (The Wolf)
Use "Gordo Slam" to knock an enemy out of cover (Gordo)
Hit more than 2 enemies with a molotov explosion (Gordo)
Killing an enemiy with a molotov explosion (Gordo)
Killing 2 enemies within 5 seconds of the first in a team match (Gordo)
